company.name: Associated Services
company.tagline: Excellence in Legal Services For Over 30 Years
company.description: Associated Services is dedicated to providing the highest quality of legal support services to law offices, government agencies, property managers and corporations across the nation. For more than 30 years clients have relied on our innovative approach and management model to ensure consistency and timely delivery of the legal services.

hero.headline: Get Your Legal Papers Served Today
hero.subheadline: We manage more than 4,000 process servers to get your legal papers served right the first time!

about.headline: About Associated Services
about.content: Associated Services is a Nationwide Process Server Management Company. What differentiates us from most agencies and local process servers is the management approach we have developed and implemented based on many years of experience. We have developed an extensive database of local process servers throughout the country, diligently selecting and overseeing each one of them. Our Team applies the 4Ps™ Management Model – a proprietary framework that ensures proper service of process every time!

seo.title: Get Your Legal Papers Served Today
seo.description: Associated Services managers process servers nationwide to deliver hassle-free service of process
